TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HelpEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户请求控件的帮助时发生此事件。The event occurs when the user requests help for a control. 对象指定鼠标指针的屏幕坐标以及事件是否已处理。A object specifies the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer and whether the event was handled. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 事件，以在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过在地址字段中按 F1 键，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击地址字段上的帮助光标，引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 将属性设置为 true 以指示 `HelpRequested` 处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示如何将帮助文本存储在 属性中。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过该帮助事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the help event was handled.

value.span: 如果处理过事件，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未将此属性设置为，则 `true` 会将事件传递到 Windows 进行其他处理。If you do not set this property to `true` the event will be passed to Windows for additional processing. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理 事件，以在包含四个地址字段的窗体上显示自定义帮助内容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 通过在地址字段中按 F1 键，或通过使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击地址字段上的帮助光标，引发事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 将属性设置为 true 以指示 `HelpRequested` 处理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 该示例还演示如何将帮助文本存储在 属性中。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针的屏幕坐标。

span.span: Gets the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.

value.span: 表示鼠标指针屏幕坐标的 。

span.span: A representing the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此信息基于鼠标指针的位置提供帮助。You can use this information to provide help based on the position of the mouse pointer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含从继承的类型的实例 ，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后命名该实例 `Control1` ，并确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#39)]
